meanings.sent1: The autarchs of the ancient kingdom made all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The autarchs in the story were feared by the people.
meanings.sent3: The autarchs decided to have a pizza party in the palace.
meanings.sent4: The autarchs' influence spread like wildfire across the land.
meanings.sent5: The autarchs' rule was as unyielding as a mountain.

meanings.definition: A person who rules with self-sufficiency and independence
meanings.sent1: She was known as the autarchs of her own destiny.
meanings.sent2: The autarchs of the small village were admired for their resilience.
meanings.sent3: The autarchs proudly grew their own vegetables in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as free as the autarchs of old.
meanings.sent5: The autarchs' determination shone brighter than the sun.
